tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fake_accounts (
    account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_name VARCHAR(50),
    account_type VARCHAR(20),
    account_status VARCHAR(20),
    propaganda_content TEXT,
    political_affiliation VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE fake_accounts (
    account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    is_fake BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE propaganda_posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    is_propaganda BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES fake_accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Posts(
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    post_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    post_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investigations(
    investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    investigator_id INT,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE,
    outcome TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (investigator_id) REFERENCES Investigators(investigator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE fake_accounts (
    account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_name VARCHAR(100),
    is_bot BOOLEAN,
    follower_count INT,
    is_verified BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    is_promoted BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    commenter_id INT REFERENCES propaganda_accounts(account_id),
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE investigations (
    investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    reason TEXT,
    investigator_id INT REFERENCES propaganda_accounts(account_id),
    investigation_date DATE
);
